analysis:
From last week (2025-08-04 to 2025-08-10) to this week (2025-08-11 to 2025-08-14), the sentiment surrounding PG has shifted from a mix of neutral and negative to predominantly neutral with some positive developments.

Key risks and negative factors mentioned:
*   Tariffs are denting profits.
*   Wavering US consumer and job market show risks to the economy.
*   3 reasons PG is risky and 1 stock to buy instead.

Key positive developments:
*   Well-heeled shoppers are shrug off price hikes for certain products.
*   Freddy Bharucha was named the next CEO of P&G Beauty.
*   TD Cowen maintains a buy rating on P&G, citing innovation and leadership shift.
*   Procter & Gamble's margins remain firm, potentially due to premiumization.
*   Baby Laundry Detergent market is expected to expand.
*   P&G is attracting investor attention.

Sentiment outlook for today (2025-08-14): Neutral

PG,2025-08-14,40.00,60.00,0.00,neutral
